name: Franke@Home
0:
”Alexa open Home Cloud”
”Alexa tell Home Cloud to turn on the hood”
”Alexa ask Home Cloud what's the air quality”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: home cloud
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With Franke@Home skill you can interact with your Franke kitchen hood by voice!
Download the Alexa skill on your smartphone and then you'll be able to command your latest paired device with the Franke@Home app (available both for iOS and Android).
Simply say "Alexa run Home Cloud" and interact with your Franke range hood.
